tools.name: Create Document
tools.description: Creates a new document file on the user's desktop

filename.description: Name of the file to create

content.description: Content to write to the file

extension.description: File extension (e.g., '.txt', '.json', '.md'). Defaults to .md if not specified

tools.ai_description: Use this tool when the user asks you to create a document, write a file, or save some text to their desktop. The filename can include spaces and hyphens. If no extension is provided, it defaults to .md. You can also specify an extension parameter separately.

ai_instructions.system_prompt_addition: You have access to tools that can perform actions on the user's behalf. When a user requests an action that matches a tool's capability, use the appropriate tool. Always explain what you're about to do before using a tool.
